statements: SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT user_id, audit_date FROM audits WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT audit_id, script_name FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT access_pattern FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, script_name, user_id FROM audits WHERE audit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC, script_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM audits GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_audits > 5
SELECT script_name, access_pattern FROM audits WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' ORDER BY script_name
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE user_id IN (1, 5, 10) AND access_pattern LIKE '%read%'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM audits WHERE access_pattern = 'view' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_audits DESC
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE PolicyID = 1;
SELECT ActionTaken, ExecutionDateTime FROM audit_logs WHERE UserID = 3 ORDER BY ExecutionDateTime DESC;
SELECT PolicyName, AccessPattern, ExecutionDateTime FROM auditing_security_policies WHERE ExecutionDateTime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM auditing_security_policies WHERE PolicyName LIKE '%password%';
SELECT UserID, ActionTaken, ExecutionDateTime FROM audit_logs WHERE ExecutionDateTime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY ExecutionDateTime ASC;
SELECT * FROM auditing_security_policies WHERE ID = 1;
SELECT PolicyName, AccessPattern FROM auditing_security_policies WHERE ExecutionDateTime > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY ExecutionDateTime DESC;
SELECT PolicyName, Result FROM auditing_security_policies JOIN audit_logs ON auditing_security_policies.ID = audit_logs.PolicyID;
SELECT UserID, ActionTaken FROM audit_logs WHERE PolicyID = 2;
SELECT * FROM Auditing_Security_Policies_Compliance;
SELECT id, script_name, audit_timestamp FROM Auditing_Security_Policies_Compliance WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, script_name, access_pattern FROM Auditing_Security_Policies_Compliance WHERE id = 5;
SELECT script_name, audit_timestamp FROM Auditing_Security_Policies_Compliance WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Reports WHERE report_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT user_id, script_name FROM User_Access_Logs WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT script_name, access_timestamp FROM User_Access_Logs WHERE script_name LIKE 'audit_%';
SELECT id, user_id, audit_timestamp FROM Auditing_Security_Policies_Compliance WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT report_id, script_name, report_date FROM Compliance_Reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_access_count FROM User_Access_Logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_access_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM auditing_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM auditing_policies;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM access_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 1;
SELECT script_id, script_name FROM sql_scripts ORDER BY script_id DESC;
SELECT script_content FROM sql_scripts WHERE script_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM auditing_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM auditing_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT script_name, script_content FROM sql_scripts WHERE script_id = 2;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM access_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_analysis WHERE analysis_result = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM policy_details ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_profiles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT assignment_id, user_id, policy_id FROM policy_assignments WHERE assignment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, count(log_id) AS access_count FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY access_count DESC;

SELECT policy_name, COUNT(assignment_id) AS assignment_count FROM policy_details INNER JOIN policy_assignments ON policy_details.policy_id = policy_assignments.policy_id GROUP BY policy_name ORDER BY assignment_count DESC;
SELECT pattern_description, pattern_script FROM access_patterns WHERE analysis_result = 'success' ORDER BY pattern_id;
SELECT username, email, role FROM user_profiles WHERE role IN ('admin', 'developer') ORDER BY username ASC;
